# Simple SERO Package Test

## Load Package and Data

```{r load}
library(SERO)
data <- sero_load_data()
cat("Data loaded successfully!\n")
cat("Available layers:", names(data), "\n")
cat("Accident rows:", nrow(data$accident), "\n")
```

## Test Hotspot Analysis

```{r hotspots}
hotspots <- sero_identify_hotspots(data$accident, buffer = 1000)
print(hotspots)
```

## Test Optimal Locations

```{r optimal}
optimal_locations <- sero_calculate_optimal_locations(data)
print(optimal_locations)
```

## Test Routes

```{r routes}
routes <- sero_calculate_routes(optimal_locations, data$accident, max_routes = 3)
print(routes)
```

## Success!

All tests completed successfully!
